bio: Patrcia Hamilton is a Marketing Consultant profesional with international experience leading/ delivering Digital Marketing Projects for Emerging Markets and Startups. For more than 5 years has worked in companies from different industries attending clients from Brazil, Argentina, Germany, USA, Denmark, Colombia, Costa Rica and LATAM countries. Posgrado e-Management MBA Marketing and Branding UFBA Business GSK - CARICAM Digital Marketing Jr. AlwaysOnVacation Community Representative- Brazil Astrazeneca GCO - Regional Engagement Manager
